event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst miss
event.description: Instruction cache miss to a cacheable location, which requires a fetch from external memory

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: Instruction stall
event.description: Stall because instruction buffer cannot deliver an instruction

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: Data stall
event.description: Stall because of a data dependency

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst micro TLB miss
event.description: Instruction MicroTLB miss (unused on ARM1156)

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data micro TLB miss
event.description: Data MicroTLB miss (unused on ARM1156)

event.title: Branch
event.name: Instruction executed
event.description: Branch instructions executed, branch might or might not have changed program flow

event.name: Not predicted
event.description: Branch not predicted

event.title: Branch
event.name: Mispredicted
event.description: Branch mispredicted

event.name: Instructions
event.description: Instructions executed

event.title: Core
event.name: Folded Instructions
event.description: Folded instructions executed

event.name: Data read access
event.description: Data cache read access, not including cache operations

event.name: Data read miss
event.description: Data cache miss, not including Cache Operations

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data write access
event.description: Data cache write access

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data write miss
event.description: Data cache write miss

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data line eviction
event.description: Data cache line eviction, not including cache operations

event.title: Branch
event.name: PC change w/o mode change
event.description: Software changed the PC and there is not a mode change

event.title: Cache
event.name: TLB miss
event.description: Main TLB miss

event.title: External
event.name: External Memory request
event.description: External memory request (cache refill, noncachable, write-back)

event.title: Cache
event.name: Stall
event.description: Stall because of Load Store Unit request queue being full

event.title: Write Buffer
event.name: Drains
event.description: The number of times the Write Buffer was drained because of LSU ordering constraints or CP15 operations (Data Synchronization Barrier command) or Strongly Ordered operation

event.title: Write Buffer
event.name: Write Merges
event.description: Buffered write merged in a store buffer slot

event.name: Cycle counter
event.description: An increment each cycle

event.name: Instruction executed

event.name: Mispredicted
event.description: Branch mis-predicted

event.name: Executed
event.description: Instructions executed

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data access
event.description: Data cache access, not including Cache operations

event.name: Data all access

event.name: Data miss

event.name: Write-back
event.description: Data cache write-back

event.name: SW change

event.title: Cache
event.name: TLB miss
event.description: Main TLB miss (unused on ARM1156)

event.title: External
event.name: Access
event.description: Explicit external data or peripheral access

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data miss
event.description: Stall because of Load Store Unit request queue being full

event.title: Write Buffer
event.name: Drains
event.description: The number of times the Write Buffer was drained because of a Data Synchronization Barrier command or Strongly Ordered operation

event.title: Disable Interrupts
event.name: FIQ
event.description: The number of cycles which FIQ interrupts are disabled (ARM1156 only)

event.title: Disable Interrupts
event.name: IRQ
event.description: The number of cycles which IRQ interrupts are disabled (ARM1156 only)

event.title: ETM
event.name: ETMEXTOUT[0]
event.description: ETMEXTOUT[0] signal was asserted for a cycle

event.title: ETM
event.name: ETMEXTOUT[1]
event.description: ETMEXTOUT[1] signal was asserted for a cycle

event.title: ETM
event.name: ETMEXTOUT[0,1]
event.description: ETMEXTOUT[0] or ETMEXTOUT[1] was asserted

event.title: Procedure
event.name: Calls
event.description: Procedure call instruction executed

event.title: Procedure
event.name: Returns
event.description: Procedure return instruction executed

event.title: Procedure
event.name: Return and predicted
event.description: Procedure return instruction executed and return address predicted

event.title: Procedure
event.name: Return and mispredicted
event.description: Procedure return instruction executed and return address predicted incorrectly

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst tag or parity error
event.description: Instruction cache Tag or Valid RAM parity error (ARM1156 only)

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst parity error
event.description: Instruction cache RAM parity error (ARM1156 only)

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data tag or parity error
event.description: Data cache Tag or Valid RAM parity error (ARM1156 only)

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data parity error
event.description: Data cache RAM parity error (ARM1156 only)

event.title: ITCM
event.name: Error
event.description: ITCM error (ARM1156 only)

event.title: DTCM
event.name: Error
event.description: DTCM error (ARM1156 only)

event.title: Procedure
event.name: Return address pop
event.description: Procedure return address popped off the return stack (ARM1156 only)

event.title: Procedure
event.name: Return address misprediction
event.description: Procedure return address popped off the return stack has been incorrectly predicted by the PFU (ARM1156 only)

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data dirty parity error
event.description: Data cache Dirty RAM parity error (ARM1156 only)

event.name: Potential prediction

event.title: Cache
event.name: Write buffer full
event.description: Any write buffer full cycle

event.title: Cache
event.name: L2 store
event.description: Any store that is merged in the L2 memory system

event.title: Cache
event.name: Bufferable transaction
event.description: Any bufferable store transaction from load/store to L2 cache, excluding eviction or cast out data

event.title: Cache
event.name: L1 miss
event.description: Any accesses to the L2 cache

event.title: Cache
event.name: L2 miss
event.description: Any cacheable miss in the L2 cache

event.title: AXI
event.name: Read
event.description: The number of AXI read data transfers

event.title: AXI
event.name: Write
event.description: The number of AXI write data transfers

event.title: Memory
event.name: Replay event
event.description: Any replay event in the memory system

event.title: Memory
event.name: Unaligned access
event.description: Any unaligned memory access that results in a replay

event.title: Cache
event.name: L1 data miss
event.description: Any L1 data memory access that misses in the cache as a result of the hashing algorithm

event.title: Cache
event.name: L1 inst miss
event.description: Any L1 instruction memory access that misses in the cache as a result of the hashing algorithm

event.title: Cache
event.name: L1 page coloring
event.description: Any L1 data memory access in which a page coloring alias occurs

event.title: NEON
event.name: L1 cache hit
event.description: Any NEON access that hits in the L1 data cache

event.title: NEON
event.name: L1 cache access
event.description: Any NEON cacheable data accesses for L1 data cache

event.title: NEON
event.name: L2 cache access
event.description: Any L2 cache accesses as a result of a NEON memory access

event.title: NEON
event.name: L2 cache hit
event.description: Any NEON hit in the L2 cache

event.title: Cache
event.name: L1 inst access
event.description: Any L1 instruction cache access, excluding CP15 cache accesses

event.title: Branch
event.name: Return stack misprediction
event.description: Any return stack misprediction because of incorrect target address for a taken return stack pop

event.title: Branch
event.name: Direction misprediction
event.description: Branch direction misprediction

event.title: Branch
event.name: Taken prediction
event.description: Any predictable branch that is predicted to be taken

event.title: Branch
event.name: Executed and taken prediction
event.description: Any predictable branch that is executed and taken

event.title: Core
event.name: Operations issued
event.description: Number of operations issued, where an operation is either: an instruction or one operation in a sequence of operations that make up a multi-cycle instruction

event.title: Core
event.name: No issue cycles
event.description: Increment for every cycle that no instructions are available for issue

event.title: Core
event.name: Issue cycles
event.description: For every cycle, this event counts the number of instructions issued in that cycle. Multi-cycle instructions are only counted once

event.title: NEON
event.name: MRC data wait
event.description: Number of cycles the processor stalls waiting on MRC data from NEON

event.title: NEON
event.name: Full queue
event.description: Number of cycles that the processor stalls as a result of a full NEON instruction queue or NEON load queue

event.title: NEON
event.name: Idle
event.description: Number of cycles that NEON and integer processors are both not idle

event.title: External
event.name: PMUEXTIN[0]
event.description: Counts any event from external input source PMUEXTIN[0]

event.title: External
event.name: PMUEXTIN[1]
event.description: Counts any event from external input source PMUEXTIN[1]

event.title: External
event.name: PMUEXTIN[0,1]
event.description: Counts any event from both external input sources PMUEXTIN[0] and PMUEXTIN[1]

event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Software
event.name: Increment
event.description: Incremented only on writes to the Software Increment Register

event.title: Cache
event.name: Instruction refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a refill of at least the level of instruction or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst TLB refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a refill of at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data access
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a cache access to at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data TLB refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Memory read
event.description: Memory-reading instruction architecturally executed

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Memory write
event.description: Memory-writing instruction architecturally executed

event.title: Exception
event.name: Taken
event.description: Exceptions taken

event.title: Exception
event.name: Return
event.description: Exception return architecturally executed

event.title: Instruction
event.name: CONTEXTIDR
event.description: Instruction that writes to the CONTEXTIDR architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: PC change
event.description: Software change of the Program Counter, except by an exception, architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Immediate
event.description: Immediate branch architecturally executed

event.title: Fault
event.name: Unaligned access
event.description: Unaligned access architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Mispredicted
event.description: Branch mispredicted or not predicted

event.title: Branch
event.name: Potential prediction
event.description: Branch or other change in program flow that could have been predicted by the branch prediction resources of the processor

event.title: Java
event.name: Bytecode execute
event.description: Counts the number of Java bytecodes being decoded, including speculative ones

event.title: Java
event.name: SW bytecode execute
event.description: Counts the number of software java bytecodes being decoded, including speculative ones

event.title: Jazelle
event.name: Backward branch execute
event.description: Counts the number of Jazelle taken branches being executed

event.title: Cache
event.name: Coherency miss
event.description: Counts the number of coherent linefill requests performed by the Cortex-A9 processor which also miss in all the other Cortex-A9 processors, meaning that the request is sent to the external memory

event.title: Cache
event.name: Coherency hit
event.description: Counts the number of coherent linefill requests performed by the Cortex-A9 processor which hit in another Cortex-A9 processor, meaning that the linefill data is fetched directly from the relevant Cortex-A9 cache

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst dependent stall
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the processor is ready to accept new instructions, but does not receive any because of the instruction side not being able to provide any and the instruction cache is currently performing at least one linefill

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data dependent stall
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the core has some instructions that it cannot issue to any pipeline, and the Load Store unit has at least one pending linefill request, and no pending TLB requests

event.title: Cache
event.name: TLB stall
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the processor is stalled waiting for the completion of translation table walks from the main TLB

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: STREX pass
event.description: Counts the number of STREX instructions architecturally executed and passed

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: STREX fail
event.description: Counts the number of STREX instructions architecturally executed and failed

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data eviction
event.description: Counts the number of eviction requests because of a linefill in the data cache

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: Issue stage no dispatch
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the issue stage does not dispatch any instruction because it is empty or cannot dispatch any instructions

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: Issue stage empty
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the issue stage is empty

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Executed
event.description: Counts the number of instructions going through the Register Renaming stage. This number is an approximate number of the total number of instructions speculatively executed, and even more approximate of the total number of instructions architecturally executed

event.title: Core
event.name: Functions
event.description: Counts the number of procedure returns whose condition codes do not fail, excluding all returns from exception

event.title: Instructions
event.name: Main execution unit
event.description: Counts the number of instructions being executed in the main execution pipeline of the processor, the multiply pipeline and arithmetic logic unit pipeline

event.title: Instructions
event.name: Second execution unit
event.description: Counts the number of instructions being executed in the processor second execution pipeline (ALU)

event.title: Instructions
event.name: Load/Store
event.description: Counts the number of instructions being executed in the Load/Store unit

event.title: Instructions
event.name: Floating point
event.description: Counts the number of Floating-point instructions going through the Register Rename stage

event.title: Instructions
event.name: NEON
event.description: Counts the number of NEON instructions going through the Register Rename stage

event.title: Stalls
event.name: PLD
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the processor is stalled because PLD slots are all full

event.title: Stalls
event.name: Memory write
event.description: Counts the number of cycles when the processor is stalled and the data side is stalled too because it is full and executing writes to the external memory

event.title: Stalls
event.name: Inst main TLB miss
event.description: Counts the number of stall cycles because of main TLB misses on requests issued by the instruction side

event.title: Stalls
event.name: Data main TLB miss
event.description: Counts the number of stall cycles because of main TLB misses on requests issued by the data side

event.title: Stalls
event.name: Inst micro TLB miss
event.description: Counts the number of stall cycles because of micro TLB misses on the instruction side

event.title: Stalls
event.name: Data micro TLB miss
event.description: Counts the number of stall cycles because of micro TLB misses on the data side

event.title: Stalls
event.name: DMB
event.description: Counts the number of stall cycles because of the execution of a DMB memory barrier

event.title: Clock
event.name: Integer core
event.description: Counts the number of cycles during which the integer core clock is enabled

event.title: Clock
event.name: Data engine
event.description: Counts the number of cycles during which the Data Engine clock is enabled

event.title: Instructions
event.name: ISB
event.description: Counts the number of ISB instructions architecturally executed

event.title: Instructions
event.name: DSB
event.description: Counts the number of DSB instructions architecturally executed

event.title: Instructions
event.name: DMB
event.description: Counts the number of DMB instructions speculatively executed

event.title: External
event.name: Interrupts
event.description: Counts the number of external interrupts executed by the processor

event.title: PLE
event.name: Cache line rq completed
event.description: Counts the number of PLE cache line requests completed

event.title: PLE
event.name: Cache line rq skipped
event.description: Counts the number of PLE cache line requests skipped

event.title: PLE
event.name: FIFO flush
event.description: Counts the number of PLE FIFO flush requests

event.title: PLE
event.name: Request completed
event.description: Counts the number of PLE FIFO flush completed

event.title: PLE
event.name: FIFO overflow
event.description: Counts the number of PLE FIFO flush overflowed

event.title: PLE
event.name: Request programmed
event.description: Counts the number of PLE FIFO flush program requests

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: CO
event.description: Eviction, CastOut, of a line from the L2 cache

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: DRH
event.description: Data read hit

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: DRREQ
event.description: Data read request

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: DWHIT
event.description: Data write hit

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: DWREQ
event.description: Data write request

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: DWTREQ
event.description: Data write request with write-through attribute

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: IRHIT
event.description: Instruction read hit

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: IRREQ
event.description: Instruction read request

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: WA
event.description: Write allocate

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: IPFALLOC
event.description: Allocation of a prefetch generated by L2C-310 into the L2 cache

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: EPFHIT
event.description: Prefetch hint hits in the L2 cache

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: EPFALLOC
event.description: Prefetch hint allocated into the L2 cache

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: SRRCVD
event.description: Speculative read received

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: SRCONF
event.description: Speculative read confirmed

event.title: L2Cache
event.name: EPFRCVD
event.description: Prefetch hint received

event.title: CPU Load
event.name: User
event.description: Scheduler CPU Load of User Application

event.title: CPU Load
event.name: System
event.description: Scheduler CPU Load of System Behavior

event.title: Interrupts
event.name: SoftIRQ
event.description: Linux SoftIRQ taken

event.title: Interrupts
event.name: IRQ
event.description: Linux IRQ taken

event.title: Disk IO
event.name: Write
event.description: Disk IO Bytes Written

event.title: Disk IO
event.name: Read
event.description: Disk IO Bytes Read

event.title: Memory
event.name: Used
event.description: Total used memory size

event.title: Memory
event.name: Free
event.description: Available memory size

event.title: Memory
event.name: Buffer
event.description: Memory used by buffers

event.title: Network
event.name: Gator
event.description: Network traffic from Gator driver

event.title: Network
event.name: Receive
event.description: Receive network traffic, excluding effect from Streamline

event.title: Network
event.name: Transmit
event.description: Transmit network traffic, excluding effect from Streamline

event.title: Scheduler
event.name: Switch
event.description: Context switch events

event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Software
event.name: Increment
event.description: Incremented only on writes to the Software Increment Register

event.title: Cache
event.name: Instruction refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a refill of at least the level of instruction or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst TLB refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a refill of at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data access
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a cache access to at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data TLB refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Memory read
event.description: Memory-reading instruction architecturally executed

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Memory write
event.description: Memory-writing instruction architecturally executed

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Executed
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed

event.title: Exception
event.name: Taken
event.description: Exceptions taken

event.title: Exception
event.name: Return
event.description: Exception return architecturally executed

event.title: Instruction
event.name: CONTEXTIDR
event.description: Instruction that writes to the CONTEXTIDR architecturally executed

event.title: Program Counter
event.name: SW change
event.description: Software change of PC, except by an exception, architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Immediate
event.description: Immediate branch architecturally executed

event.title: Fault
event.name: Unaligned access
event.description: Unaligned access architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Mispredicted
event.description: Branch mispredicted or not predicted

event.title: Branch
event.name: Potential prediction
event.description: Branch or other change in program flow that could have been predicted by the branch prediction resources of the processor
